title: EV and Hybrid subsidies to continue for now, reiterates Uttar Pradesh
description: The Uttar Pradesh government will maintain incentives for electric and hybrid cars to mitigate low market penetration. Automakers express concerns about these incentives affecting the transition to full electric vehicles. Officials stressed that the policy is flexible and could change, aiming to encourage a shift away from conventional fuel vehicles.
